entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
